definition: surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: A:The actress said that she didn't have her breasts enlarged.
sentences.chinese: 那女明星說她沒有去隆胸。

sentences.english: The average age at which a woman gets implants is thirty-four.
sentences.chinese: 美國女性平均隆胸年齡爲34歲。

sentences.english: Foot binding was a cosmetic practice, not much different in its own way from breast implantations or nose reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 纏足是一種裝飾行爲，和隆胸或隆鼻殊途同歸。

sentences.english: For the first time in 12 years, liposuction is a runner-up in popularity to breast augmentation.
sentences.chinese: 隆胸術的流行程度12年來首度超過吸脂術。

sentences.english: Quite a few years ago, a friend of mine had breast augmentation surgery.
sentences.chinese: 好幾年前，我的一個朋友做了一個隆胸手術。

sentences.english: Some say Barbie is responsible for breast implants and eating disorders.
sentences.chinese: 有人說芭比娃娃是引起隆胸和飲食無規律的罪魁禍首。

sentences.english: I have a friend who’s 25 and she was always against getting her boobs done.
sentences.chinese: 我有個25歲的朋友，過去總是反對給自己隆胸。

sentences.english: The victim got a boob job two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 這位令人不可思議的幸運兒於兩年前接受隆胸手術。

sentences.english: Breast enlargement was the most popular operation for women, while liposuction was the next most popular.
sentences.chinese: 隆胸是婦女中最常見的手術，抽脂次之。

sentences.english: There's no way of estimating how many ‘botched’ boob jobs there are each year.
sentences.chinese: 沒法估計每年做了多少“拙劣的”隆胸手術。

sentences.english: My boyfriend recently told me that he would like it if I got breast implants.
sentences.chinese: 最近我的男朋友告訴我，他非常喜歡我去隆胸。

sentences.english: Here is a silicone breast implant.
Add that, oh, and by the way, you absolutely are not getting breast implants.
sentences.chinese: 哦，對了，通過這種方法，你也不用去做隆胸手術了。

sentences.english: Particular kind has paint external application to brush agent and instrument of use grand bosom to wait.
sentences.chinese: 具體的方式有塗抹外用擦劑和使用隆胸儀器等。

sentences.english: Nine months into her lap-dancing career, Danns had a breast enlargement.
sentences.chinese: 九個月的脫衣舞生涯以後，丹納斯去做了隆胸手術。

definition: shaping/reshaping/plastic surgery or orthopedics (abbr. of 整形外科[zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1])
abbr. for 微整形[wei1 zheng3 xing2]
non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
an abortion/abbr. of 人工流產手術|人工流产手术
